se.umu.jayo0002.iremind.database

Class TaskRepo

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.umu.jayo0002.iremind.database.TaskRepo

  • public class TaskRepo
extends java.lang.Object
    This object provide a single source of data from the database to the TaskViewModel. It communicates between the TaskViewModel and the database.
    Since:
    2019 -12-09
